summary: MY WIFE WHO IS 7 MONTHS PREGNANT WHO ALSO HAD MY 5 YEAR OLD SON WITH HER, WAS PROCEEDING ON THE I-210 WHEN OUR 2000 FORD FOCUS SUDDENLY STALLED GOING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, THERE WERE MANY CARS BEHIND HER AND KEEPING HER WITS ABOUT HER PULLED THE CAR INTO THE EMERGENCY LANE, NARROWLY MISSING BEING REAR ENDED. AFTER SEVERAL ATTEMPTS, THE CAR RE-STARTED AND SHE WAS ABLE TO GET TO A PHONE AND CALL ME FOR ASSITANCE. ONCE I GOT THE CAR MOVING, I WAS NOTICING A STALLING AS WELL.
